member.name: T:Anzu.AnzuCamera
member.summary: Responsible for storing the camera used by `AnzuCore`. Allows manual camera setup when multiple cameras are used.

member.name: P:Anzu.AnzuCamera.ActiveCamera
member.summary: Gets the current active camera in the scene, used by the Anzu SDK.

member.name: M:Anzu.AnzuCamera.ResetManualCamera
member.summary: Disables manual camera. Enables `ActiveCamera` to be found automatically.

member.name: F:Anzu.UriHookData.Arguments
member.summary: Stores a collection of arguments as key-value pairs.

member.name: T:Anzu.AnzuUriHook
member.summary: Manages the registration of URI schema callbacks.

member.name: M:Anzu.AnzuUriHook.RegisterHook(System.String,System.Action{Anzu.UriHookData})
member.summary: Adds a callback for the specified URI schema. If the schema already exists, the callback is not added.
member.param: The URI schema to register the callback for.
The callback to invoke when the schema is matched.
member.remarks: All registered schema hooks are removed on AnzuCore uninitialization.
